akas: Black and White Love World-wide (English title) (literal English title)
akas from release info: Black and White Love World-wide (English title) (literal English title)

1.title: Black and White Love
1.plot: Ferhat learns that Namik's computer has been stolen. The documents inside the computer could end Namik's mayoral elections that he has prepared for years and he could end in jail. Ferhat catches Adem, who stole the computer and accidentally Adem is shot. Ferhat needs to have Adem alive in order to find the computer. Asli, a general surgeon, goes to his place in order to help a doctor friend, who fell in sick and finds herself on Ferhat's farm. She has to operate the man who got shot. Asli, who does not want to get involved in illegal activities, is forced to play ...

2.title: Black and White
2.plot: Asli's main goal is to escape and save herself. Ferhat, however, threatens her with her brother's life in case she does. Moreover, the time is getting narrower, and with the more enthusiasm of Yeter, it is rapidly advancing towards this marriage which will be forcibly forced. Will she succeed in escaping Ferhat and his family and will be able to save herself from this captivity? Cem learns that his sister has disappeared, he collaborates to find Asli with the prosecutor Yigit, who is trying to uncover the unclean work of his uncle Namik. But they still have to face ...

3.title: If it Was Me (Ben Olsaydim)
3.plot: Asli and Ferhat get married despite the unwillingness of Cem and Yigit for this marriage to happen, Asli cannot break the agreement she made with Ferhat and can not tell her brother the truth despite the whole insistence of Cem. Moreover she is forced to live in the same house with Ferhat and to play a domestic game that she and her family never wanted. The encounter with Yigit affects everybody in the house, especially Yeter and Namik. She wants to approach her son, whom she misses so much, but Namik is definitely against it. Cuneyt will face Ferhat, who follows the ...

4.title: I Realized That (Anladim Ki)
4.plot: Asli stabs Ferhat and meets the black in herself and experiences a great tremor. She did what she said she would never do and hurt a living being. As she's worried about what's going to happen, Ferhat takes her to the manor where his family lives. As long as she gets to know them, the fact that they are forced to live in the secrets of this family she will understand better how it is actually a great punishment for her. Cem and Yigit continue to try every way to bring out the dirty world of Namik and Ferhat. The situation of Esra becomes serious, she needs to be ...

5.title: Without Realizing
5.plot: Asli, Ferhat's takes another blow that she did not expect with his kiss. However, Ferhat realizes that he has not been able to control the emotions he has been trapped for years, besides Asli, for a moment, and this situation is quite shocking to him.

6.title: If you love
6.plot: Asli puts herself in jeopardy for Ebru not to get caught. Will Asli be saved before she gets caught? Who is the mysterious enemy of the past, all the rage? The enemy's first goal is Asli - Why?

7.title: The Sound of my Heart
7.plot: Ferhat enters an operation that carries the risk of being injured. Asli will do this surgery. Asli, who has fallen between hatred and love, is trapped between Ferhat's death-and-death battle.

8.title: You Loved
8.plot: Asli decides to tell hidden facts to Yigit. Asli and Ferhat, who act together to save Gülsüm, take another step towards recognizing each other. Asli, tired of overtaking tension, makes a move to change all the balances and decides to tell everything to Prosecutor Yigit.

9.title: The issue is love
9.plot: Ferhat returns to madness with the news that Yigit's house has been shot. Ferhat takes action to find out who did this. Asli and Ferhat are worried about their brothers.

10.title: Sometimes Facts
10.plot: Ferhat and Cuneyt are looking for a way out, surrounded by Sahin's men. Asli learns that Ferhat's head is in trouble, she goes after him without thinking. Ferhat is now opposed to an enemy he does not know who he is.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Namik is disturbed by the increasing proximity of Asli and Ferhat. Asli in a big dilemma. Should she tell Ferhat the truth or be silent to protect him? Ferhat has to choose between Asli and his family. Ebru gets marriage decision with Cem.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Asli leaves with Ferhat, Asli realizes that her life has become meaningful with him. In his farewell message she wrote to say what was inside, will she regret to tell Ferhat that his real father was not Necdet?

13.title: I Have a Feeling (içimden Bir Ses)
13.plot: Ferhat gets arrested and goes to prison. He entrusts Asli to Yigit. Asli, who is struggling to save Ferhat, learns that it is the main enemy beside the Ebru. Is it the end of the road for Asli who understands that Ebru is the daughter of the Sahin?

14.title: Because Love (Çünkü Sevda)
14.plot: Thinking about killing an innocent person, Yigit cries out to Ferhat while Suna blames him for what happened. Will Ferhat, who has failed to protect Yigit, will be able to save him after the iron bars? Idil and Namik are preparing for the wedding. Namik asks Yeter to leave the house.

15.title: What I Could Not Say (Söyleyemediklerim)
15.plot: Yeter, she confesses to Asli, who she shot Namik. This dangerous mystery ends with Idil telling Ferhat the truth. Yeter, in the face of Ferhat's questioning gaze, will she explain why she shot Namik?

16.title: Because I Love (Sevdigim için)
16.plot: While Ferhat can not say that he wants to divorce Asli, Asli is aware of Ferhat's fugitive fighting. Abidin decides to marry Gülsüm. Asli thinks that Ferhat is turning his back on his loved ones, she tries to serve as a bridge between Gülsüm and Ferhat; however, Ferhat will not allow.

17.title: Seni Seviyorum Çünkü
17.plot: Idil gets confused when she says that Yeter pushes her out of the stairs. Namik keeps Yeter responsible for the death of his baby and decides to send her to Bolu. However, there is someone waiting for a long time to hold the hand of Yeter, which is put in front of the door.

18.title: For my loved ones
18.plot: Asli and Ferhat are free to live away from their loved ones, the only obstacle is not Namik. Cem asks Asli to stay away from Ferhat. Will Asli take her brother against Ferhat?

19.title: Do not leave my hands
19.plot: Will Asli save Cem? Moreover, it is not only Cüneyt who wants Cem to die. Yeter is arrested on the grounds that she shot Namik. When Yigit questions Yeter, he faces a fact that he never dreamed of. What will Yigit do in the face of this reality?

20.title: I Promised Myself
20.plot: Asli is making a critical decision for her future. Asli, who is very far from her old peaceful life, has been disturbed from Ferhat. Asli, who can not recognize the face she sees at the mirror, comes to the verdict of making new decisions.

21.title: This Tale does not End
21.plot: The death of her brother Cem causes re-questioning of Asli's life. Asli wants to return to her old days of peacefulness. Asli realizes that she does not belong to this life and decides to leave Ferhat.

22.title: I loved so much (Çok Sevdim)
22.plot: She is beside a protective angel when Asli is in a major accident. Asli and Ferhat, who are in a divorce decree, learn that they are three people at the time of the accident. Will the couple who learns that Asli is pregnant will be able to make a fresh start with this news?

23.title: Do not leave us
23.plot: Asli lies to Ferhat about the abortion, she also learns about her family's history from her niece. Ferhat begins a dangerous new deal with Namik and Yigit tries to stop him.

24.title: I Won't Give Up On Us
24.plot: Yigit is attacked in the middle of the street. Asli and Ferhat's divorce decision is discussed again after the news of pregnancy. Asli thinks Ferhat will not be a good father. Asli, who plans to grow her baby on her own after she gets divorced from Ferhat, admits the secret truth.

25.title: Just us (Sedece Biz)
25.plot: Prosecutor Yigit, who has become a target after the operation he has conducted with smugglers, is shot in the middle of the street. This event will ruin Ferhat and Yigit will be removed to the hospital. Yigit succeeds in getting rid of this injury thanks to the protective vest he wears. Ferhat takes new decisions about his life after his brother Yigit is shot. Ferhat, who has to think about Asli and her child, is preparing a new life that will leave everything behind. This proposal, which Asli has been waiting for a long time, has finally arrived. Jülide, who came to ...

26.title: For Us (Bizim için)
26.plot: Ferhat pursues what Jülide says is true. On the other hand, he tries to keep Asli away from this issue.

27.title: Believe me (Güven Bana)
27.plot: Ferhat is crushed under the weight of being kept secret from Asli. Will Ferhat, who does not want such a secret in his love, confess to Asli everything? Although Ferhat tries to keep Asli away from Vildan, it will not be easy to prevent the pair from facing them. Yigit goes to the dark side as he approaches the solving of the secret of Necdet's murder. Ferhat, aware of this change in his brother, is unaware that when he takes action to stop Yigit, he approaches the big secret about his own past.

28.title: It doesn't end like this (Böyle Bitmez)
28.plot: The truth that Asli knows, everything is changing balance. Asli will decide to leave the house. However, an unexpected situation will cause the Asli to delay the departure plans for a period of time. Ferhat does his best to prevent Asli from going. Will Asli and Ferhat love succeed in passing this great exam in front of them?

29.title: Stay with me (Bana Kal De)
29.plot: Hulya and Dilsiz's wedding will bring Ferhat and Asli together again, the wedding night will come to an unexpected danger and who is the target? The shocking incident that happened at the wedding will give Yigit a helping hand to get Namik to justice. Ferhat, while going to great confrontation with Namik, will the plan Yigit set up be successful?

30.title: My Truth (Benim Gerçegim)
30.plot: Ferhat goes after Namik who has managed to get rid of the cops. The only objective is to find Namik before the police and take Necdet's revenge. He will not be afraid of burning and destroying what is around him. Asli will do her best to prevent Ferhat from making a mistake that is not a return. What Asli will do will cause new hurdles to appear between the love of the two. Will Asli succeed in restoring Ferhat's anger with her love?

31.title: Our Way (Bizim Yolumuz)
31.plot: Ferhat, who learns that Namik is his father, must face this great truth. Will Ferhat choose to bring down the weapon that Namik is pointing to, or will he give the punishment of Namik with his own hands? This great secret that opens is a new test for Asli and Ferhat love. In spite of everything, Asli will do her best to keep Ferhat alone.

32.title: Final
32.plot: While the life of Asli and the baby is still dangerous, Ferhat begins to attract the punishment of what he does. Asli and the baby succeed in winning the life war they have given. Ferhat makes plans to close the shortcomings of his past with Asli. He makes a surprise marriage proposal to the dinner he prepares for Asli. The weddings of Asli and Ferhat are being performed; Namik Emirhan has an unexpected move.

imdb.plot outline: Ferhat a cold-blooded, emotionless and cruel man who is a shooter for his uncle and has a wounded past.Asli, is a naive female doctor who wishes to serve humanity. An unforgettable love will be experienced with these two contrasting characters. Black and white as opposed to the love of the opposite characters will encounter a full of adventure.
imdb.title: Black and White Love
plot: A doctor who has devoted herself to healing others encounters a cold-blooded killer with a wounded past. What happens when the woman who saves lives is captured by the man who takes them?::ahmetkozan

Ferhat a cold-blooded, emotionless and cruel man who is a shooter for his uncle and has a wounded past.Asli, is a naive female doctor who wishes to serve humanity. An unforgettable love will be experienced with these two contrasting characters. Black and white as opposed to the love of the opposite characters will encounter a full of adventure.::Eric
